TopicTitle: Interstellar plugin - electrical generator efficiency problem

Articles.Content:
Hi

sorry for my english

i'm using the interstellar-e mod, version 1.5.0

it seems i can't use correctly the generator and nuclear reactors...

the Thermal electric generator efficiency seems to steadily reduce its efficiency in the course of the launch

at the launch pad it can have for example a 20-30% efficiency

out of the atmosphere : even less then 2% and reducing

I always check to have enough radiators to keep the generators online (the helper is on the green...)

At the launch both the fusion and the fission reactors are online

do you have any hints? How can i upgrade the generator?

Best current tech :

  • Experimental electrics
  • Advanced fusion reactors

thanks

Blad

Edited September 14, 2015 by bladela

ok

the problem was in the radiators

the helper gives also a hint of the full power efficiency

bye

Blad
